author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Se þe wille anwald agon,      ðonne sceal he ærest tilian
text.1: þæt he his selfes      on sefan age
text.2: anwald innan,      þy læs he æfre sie
text.4: ado of his mode      mislicra fela
text.5: þara ymbhogona      þe him unnet sie,
text.10: efne swa wide      swa swa westmest nu
text.11: an iglond ligð      ut on garsecg,
text.12: þær nængu bið      niht on sumera
text.13: ne wuhte þon ma      on wintra dæg
text.14: toteled tidum,      þæt is Tile haten;
text.15: þeah nu anra hwa      ealles wealde
text.18: þeah he nu þæt eall      agan mote,
text.19: hwy bið his anwald      auhte ðy mara,
text.20: gif he siððan nah      his selfes geweald
text.22: wel ne bewarenað      wordum and dædum
text.23: wið ða unþeawas      þe we ymb sprecað?
